website_summaries.verdict: A compact hairbrush cleaner that's simple to use and holds up well over time.
pros: Sturdy brush features long, stiff bristles that won't bend
Takes just five minutes to remove hair and debris
cons: May get clogged up with the debris it removes from your brush

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for removing hair from natural bristle brushes
customer_reviews.text: This does an excellent job of cleaning hair out of my Kent, natural bristle brush. I'm careful not to insert it at the base of the bristles, so as not to damage the finish of the wood. This makes it very easy to remove the hair caught in the bristles, and is the perfect accompaniment to Kent and other natural bristle brushes. Thank you very much for reading my review. If it was helpful, please click the “Helpful” button below.
customer_reviews.author: Beth ATop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I tried one of those brush rakes that has an array of wire prongs, but the prongs kept bending and it didn't do a very good job of removing hair from my brush. It does take some effort, though. The Kent rake is not delicate at all and you can use it vigorously on your brush (mine is boar). My brush is round. I'm thinking about buying a flat boar brush which I suspect it would be even easier to clean with this rake.
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: I just discovered a brush cleaner existed.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I found this product! This little brush makes it so much easier to remove loose hairs that tangle in my brushes so I can really get them clean down i the base of the brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another great Kent hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Keny brush but wanted a slightly smaller one that fitted into my travel toilet bag. I contacted Kent, in the UK, who were most helpful and chose this on their recommendation. Feels great on my silver thinning hair. I expect this brush to outlast me!
customer_reviews.author: Martin H. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good, Not Great, Tool.  Works Well.
customer_reviews.text: It does work well. It does not work wonderfully well. The bristles on this cleaning brush seem to be packed a little too densely to really get in and clean out a hairbrush quickly and thoroughly. It does however do the job with just a little bit of attention and extra effort. It does the job better than using a comb or another brush. So definitely a worthwhile product if you have a good hairbrush that you want to maintain and keep clean. I just wish it was as over the top fantastic as the Kent hairbrushes are!
customer_reviews.author: R. Jimerson

customer_reviews.title: The must brush for your brush
customer_reviews.text: This brush is ideal for any waver or OCD person like myself who likes to clean what they use daily or want to keep they're personal products clean.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Luis Davila

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning boar bristle brush
customer_reviews.text: Great for cleaning my boar bristle brush. It takes some effort but it removes all the fluff and gunk stuck between the dense bristles. I have had this since 2012 and it still works great. I used to toss out my brushes when I cannot remove the fluffy dirt off, but now it has extended the life of my brush.
customer_reviews.author: riasupermomma

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This product is used to remove excess hair from hair brushes. It works very well and I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: cecelia vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Great at removing hair
customer_reviews.text: this tool removes hair from my brushes perfectly. I wouldnt say its good for removing buildup though.
customer_reviews.author: S. G.

customer_reviews.title: Yes it works very well
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean a Kent brush for cashmere clothing. It works very quickly to clean the brush, and seems to be the best tool for the job. I should have bought it when I bought the brush. I recommend Kent, excellent brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t get hair out from my brush as it suppose to, disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: A good buy for cleaning hair brushes.
customer_reviews.text: It did what the brush was describe doing, so I like very much.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dewit

customer_reviews.title: you might as well get the cleaning brush to keep it in good
customer_reviews.text: if you're going to invest in a kent brush, you might as well get the cleaning brush to keep it in good shape
customer_reviews.author: K. M. Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Great little tool
customer_reviews.text: I got this to clean my husband's military-style hairbrush and it did a great job. Very easy to use, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R.

customer_reviews.title: to make better and more direct contact without the slight give with ...
customer_reviews.text: The bristles could have been more firmer, to make better and more direct contact without the slight give with the hair brush bristles when cleaning the hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and like it so much I ordered one for my husband. He too, is happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: You really can't go wrong with anything made by Kent and this brush cleaner is no exception.
customer_reviews.text: You really can't go wrong with anything made by Kent and this brush cleaner is no exception.
customer_reviews.author: G. Crinnion

customer_reviews.title: Much Needed Hairbrush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize a hairbrush cleaner could be so helpful. Used to use a comb for this. Not any more. This tool is great and helps get brushes clean extremely well. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Garden Lover

customer_reviews.title: It leaves my brush clean and feeling great.
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it states. I have no problems pulling any hair out of my Kent brush with this cleaner. It leaves my brush clean and feeling great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hairbrush cleaner does a perfect job on the brush. It does the job so easily. No fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Keach

customer_reviews.title: Kent Brush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Cleaned up my Kent brush without much effort. And, the brush liked being related to the device!
customer_reviews.author: BobT

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient, a must have tool in your beard ...
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient, a must have tool in your beard grooming kit. I didn't know how much i needed this until I actually bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my brushes up to my standards
customer_reviews.text: Works on my brushes but is a little hard to maneuver in between the rounded brush setup since the lines are more concave.
customer_reviews.author: Rajai Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: small but perfect tool.
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for some time for something like this that can be used at home and on the road.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Critelli

customer_reviews.title: VERY Effective!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this in error when I bought my new GORGEOUS Kent brush. When I opened my brush package I discovered to my happy surprise that this came will my brush, and I didn't need to buy a separate one!!! But regardless, this thing is very easy to use, effective, and great for keeping your INVESTMENT clean and beautiful!!
customer_reviews.author: Vilanya

customer_reviews.title: Used one for years and loved it (great for quick brush clean-ups)
customer_reviews.text: Used one for years and loved it (great for quick brush clean-ups), but when I decided to use it on my Kent Woody-Hog brush half the bristles broke off and had to replace it with a new. Conclusion: GREAT BUT DO NOT USE WITH A KENT "WOODY-HOG" BRUSH.
customer_reviews.author: IAM

customer_reviews.title: A little glue makes it perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little brush but we had to replace the first one because the brushes started falling out. This time we super glued the brushes in there along the base so it should lat a long time. It does a great job cleaning my hair brush.
customer_reviews.author: Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very solid product. Hard plastic and the bristles are VERY stiff; just what you need for cleaning out a hair brush or using for whatever.
customer_reviews.author: IndyJim

customer_reviews.title: As represented.
customer_reviews.text: As represented. It does the job as well as any similar product ever has. Not perfect, but nothing is better, yet.
customer_reviews.author: mechanic

customer_reviews.title: Hairbrush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: The hairbrush cleaner got most of the debris between the bristles but did not get much of the things trapped in the base of the bristles.
customer_reviews.author: jwb

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this computer. Booted once then dead. Total piece of crap!!!!----
customer_reviews.author: wendy j hall

customer_reviews.title: Great brush, does exactly what it's supposed to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good item for anybody to have if you own a brush for your hair, beard or both! You hold the brush you want to clean vertically downwards over either a sink or trash can, then run this brushes bristles through the hair brush and watch as all the hair and trapped skin flakes are easily moved out the other end straight into the trash receptacle. Quickly, conveniently and no mess. Just another great product from the fine folks over at KENT Combs.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Nifty cleaner--easy & effective to use
customer_reviews.text: If you let the hair build up in a natural bristle brush, it loses effectiveness. This brush cleaner works very quickly and easily to remove loose hairs without damaging a fine hairbrush. You can use a comb to do the job, but I think the bristles on this product penetrate deeper to work more thoroughly and faster. One star off as it is a little pricey.
customer_reviews.author: 4everhopeful

customer_reviews.title: A most royal brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I have a Kent military style men's hairbrush. There is a lot of room in between the bristles so this brush cleaner is perfect as it gets all of the gunk out. I had one before and it broke. So use caution and do not scrape your brush with this too hard. This is a bit delicate - warning for guys with big hands and strong grips.
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Works just as it should to clean my Mason Pearson brush. When I first opened it I was skeptical...but I'm sold. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: MountaineeringGal

customer_reviews.title: It's a Good Investment
customer_reviews.text: We like the fact that it is a more substantial brush cleaner than what is typically sold. The actual brush hairs" are not flimsy. The thing is more costly than the plastic variations, the "hairs" are sturdier, and it works much better.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Be Good

customer_reviews.title: Great brush!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice size, not small, its a beast that works great. Great seller as well. If your looking for it and want it you shouldn't be disappointed, not flimsy, great strong quality, recommended
customer_reviews.author: Trinidad Martinez

customer_reviews.title: An essential tool for maintaining your garment care kit
customer_reviews.text: I use it to clean my Kent boar bristle garment brush. Perfect companion and small enough for my travel kit. Highly recommend them both.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Good cleaning brush
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this cleaning brush. Does great job cleaning cat brush and human hair brush. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner of the brushes
customer_reviews.text: This little brush helps get the hairs and other things out of my brushes. It is a good size and has sturdy bristles to get in there and dig out the junk. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Den Grimme Aeling

customer_reviews.title: Handy for nylon brushes
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used it yet I’ll use it for the brush I got at the same tie
customer_reviews.author: Katie M

customer_reviews.title: Reminds me I'm going bald with all the hair removed from my brush.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hairbrush cleaner tool. I like to keep my Kent brush really hairfree. This is the right tool for the job.
customer_reviews.author: steve wheat

customer_reviews.title: The bristles have little barbs on the end.....
customer_reviews.text: The bristles of the cleaner have little barbs on the end, to catch dead hairs and fluff in the bristles and on the base of your hairbrush. I tested the cleaner on my 40 year old Kent hairbrush. It did an excellent job of cleaning it. However, I bought this cleaner to help me maintain my new Kent hairbrush. I thought it was time to indulge myself in one of life's little pleasures. I strongly recommend buying this cleaner as a companion to a new, quality hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: MiataGuy

customer_reviews.title: Brush cleaning brush
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Removes hair easily from a variety of brushes and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mozart

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little brush cleaner
customer_reviews.text: I thought that this was kind of a gimmick but decided to give this a try on my ebony wood Kent MN-11. It works like a charm. Does the job in cleaning the hairs and junk out of the brush. If you have an expensive Kent brush and intend on keeping it for years to come, I would recommend this hair brush cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This little brush is excellent and really does the intended job. Hopefully, it will help to keep the bristles in my very expensive Kent hair brush. I didn't realise that you were not meant to wash those brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Giulianotti

customer_reviews.title: a must have!!
customer_reviews.text: brilliant I used this on all of my families natural boar brushes worth every penny!!1
customer_reviews.author: Amock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried a different style of brush cleaner before. The KENT is sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: OnLineShopper

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing how well this works
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how well this works, a great thing. I shed a lot but fortunately grow it back quite well..........
customer_reviews.author: Craig, no longer in Burlingame

customer_reviews.title: effective and easy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a worn toothbrush for this function forever. Finally, a tool that does the job easily and effectively. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the fastest way to clean a hair brush, you wont believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie McBirney

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: This little brush works great for getting hair and dust and fluff that collect in the bore bristle brushes.All you need to do is get down at the base of the hairbrush and brush up the brisles and you get the dust that collects.Great product.
customer_reviews.author: greenlove

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It works extremely well and is the essence of simplicity. Well made, sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool
customer_reviews.text: My husband is amazed how simply this product cleans his brush. He used to use his comb and that didn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Legs Marty

customer_reviews.title: Hair brush Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Works well with old and new brushes. Should have used it long ago as I had to dispose of my favorites hair brush because I didn't have this.
customer_reviews.author: sowandreap22

customer_reviews.title: How to brush a brush
customer_reviews.text: This goes along with my Kent boar bristle hair brush and it does quite well. Instructions on the package...Easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Ron in Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Buy for any comb !
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on using a comb or brush then buy this! The bristles are designed, it seems , to clean up what mere soap and water will not!
customer_reviews.author: PACKERS FAN

customer_reviews.title: OK, with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: Nice little brush, but it clogs up with the stuff it cleans and has to be cleaned itself.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Steiner

customer_reviews.title: An over-priced little piece of plastic which does a good job but probably won't last for the life of ...
customer_reviews.text: An over-priced little piece of plastic which does a good job but probably won't last for the life of the hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Good to have
customer_reviews.text: As someone who likes to keep things clean and in good shape I opted to buy a new cleaner when I purchased my latest Kent hairbrush. Take care of your Kent brush and it will last your lifetime. :)
customer_reviews.author: Eric K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An excellent tool to keep your bristle brush in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Pepe

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: If you own a Kent hair brush or any hair brush you need this handy hair brush cleaner! Compact and utilitarian.
customer_reviews.author: Wilbur H. Harkey

customer_reviews.title: Essential tool for Your Hairbrush
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Kent Hair Brush Cleaner to accompany my Kent MN1B mens' hair brush. The hair brush cleaner is my normal tool in keeping my MN1B in good shape. By pulling up hair from the sides of the brush, the bristles remain intact and in good shape. Clean up is easy with a quick rinse and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy D

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say about this little brush cleaning device. It's plastic but seems pretty durable. The brush head could be used on any number of items around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: What did I use before?
customer_reviews.text: Great little brush/comb for keeping my hairbrush clean. Everyone should own one. It comes from one of the great brush makers, designed to keep their brushes in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Cohen

product_meta.title: Kent Hair Brush Cleaner
product_meta.description: Our 149mm L PC2 Cleaning brush is filled with nylon that removes loose dead hair and thoroughly cleans hairbrush base. Suitable to use for all types of brushes.
feature_bullets: Removes dead hairs and thoroughly cleans
Nylon bristles load and plastic handle
Suitable for all types of the hairbrush
Comfortable long handle for easy use
